author: AT_AT_Driver
title: Best Non-Star-Wars Key Ring
review:
It's hard to find a cool minifigure beyond Star Wars. But this Power Miner is cool, because he:

  • -is from Power Miners, a theme with nice vehicles
  • -is complete with metal (like your keys!)
  • -has the nearly the same visor like the men from Ice Planet 2002, a nostalgic factor, but I have already lost it, it must be fixed like all the other pieces
  • -is part of a theme by Lego, no license-stuff-also looks like a robot without a human face-can be compared with Lego City, my favorite theme which has no cool key chains
